name: 4th World Nanotechnology Summit (Worldnano-2022)
content: Phronesis LLC welcomes everyone to participate in “4th World Nanotechnology Summit (Worldnano-2022)” scheduled on September 19-20, 2022 at Miami, USA. Conference is bounded with the theme “Explore the Scientific and Technical Advances in the Field of Nanotechnology”. Worldnano-2022 comprised of varied scientific sessions which covers all frontier topics in nanotechnology.
organizers: Sheraton Miami Airport Hotel & Executive Meeting Center, 3900 NW 21st Street Miami, FL 33142, USA
